AssignedPermissions.name: Catalog Consume Business Group Management
AssignedPermissions.description: Consume services, resources and manage requests on behalf of other users within a Business Group

AssignedPermissions.name: Manage user data (requests, items, tasks etc) within a business group.
AssignedPermissions.description: Manage user created objects belonging to a specific business group.

AssignedPermissions.name: Catalog Consume Requests and Resources requested by self
AssignedPermissions.description: Consume services and resources for one's self and manage one's own requests

AssignedPermissions.name: My business group Administration User Interface
AssignedPermissions.description: Access my business group administration GUI.

AssignedPermissions.name: Catalog Business Group-level Entitlement Management
AssignedPermissions.description: Entitle services, catalog items and actions to users within a Business Group.
